items.sentence: Maybe I should spend a few minutes with Tom alone.
My little sister asked me to teach her how to ski.
Nobody can blame you for falling in love with Tom.
I\'ve always thought you knew how to speak French.
I\'ve asked Tom to babysit for us on Monday night.
I\'ve been trying to get Tom to donate some money.
I\'ve never heard Tom say anything bad about Mary.
It looks like Tom hasn\'t shaved in a couple days.
Are you sure you don\'t want to study at my house?
He couldn\'t stand being away from his girlfriend.
